detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ERC677BridgeToken.callAfterTransfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC677BridgeToken.sol#677-682):
	External calls:
	- AddressUtils.isContract(_to) && ! contractFallback(_from,_to,_value,new bytes(0)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC677BridgeToken.sol#678)
		- _to.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(ON_TOKEN_TRANSFER,_from,_value,_data)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC677BridgeToken.sol#696)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- ContractFallbackCallFailed(_from,_to,_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC677BridgeToken.sol#680)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [ERC677BridgeToken.callAfterTransfer(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC677BridgeToken.sol#L677-L682):
	External calls:
	- [AddressUtils.isContract(_to) && ! contractFallback(_from,_to,_value,new bytes(0))](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC677BridgeToken.sol#L678)
		- [_to.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(ON_TOKEN_TRANSFER,_from,_value,_data))](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC677BridgeToken.sol#L696)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [ContractFallbackCallFailed(_from,_to,_value)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC677BridgeToken.sol#L680)
